orderedlist.listitem: C:\Texas Instruments\ZStack-1.4.3-1.2.1\Documents\CC2430 directory after installing the Z-Stack installer

section.title: CC2431定位COM数据格式
section.orderedlist: 其本概念 BB Baseband CCA Clear Channel Assessment MAC Media Access Control NHLE Next Higher Layer Entity NWK Network PHY Physical Layer PIB Personal Information Base SPI Serial Port Interface
section.para: The physical transmission uses: no Parity; 8 data bits and 1 stop bits for each byte.
